tianchen92 commented on pull request #5317: ARROW-6460: [Java] Add benchmark and large fake data UT for avro adapter
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5317
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6460](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6460).
   
   i. This issue is about to add tests with a large fake data set (600000 rows) and ensures no OOMs occur.
   ii. Add benchmark for avro iterator to get a baseline number.

fields.description:
To avoid OOM, we have implement iterator API in ARROW-6220.

This issue is about to add tests with a large fake data set (say 6MM rows in JDBC adapter test) and ensures no OOMs occur.
fields.summary: [Java] Add benchmark and large fake data UT for avro adapter

comments.body: as part of this can we add in a performance test as well to get a baseline number.
